Description: The constructor "Coroutine" calls a virtual method "process".
The following statement contains a magic number: if (Obj.Master.MainID < 8192) //The main subroutine is local.                  Main = Obj.GetBHAV(Obj.Master.MainID);

The following statement contains a magic number: if(Obj.Master.MasterID < 4096) //The main subroutine is global.              {                  Main = m_Module.Globals.GetBHAV(Obj.Master.MainID);                  IsGlobal = true;              }

The following statement contains a magic number: if (Obj.Master.MainID < 8192 && IsGlobal != true) //The main subroutine is local.                  Main = Obj.GetBHAV(Obj.Master.MainID);              else if(Obj.Master.MainID > 8192) //The main subroutine is semi-global.              {                  //TODO: Is this the correct ID of the GLOB chunk?                  Iff SemiGlobal = FileManager.GetIFF(Obj.GetGLOB(Obj.Master.Global).SemiGlobalIFF);                  Main = SemiGlobal.GetBHAV(Obj.Master.MainID);              }
